TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IcmpV4Statistics extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供本地计算机的 Internet 控制消息协议 IPv4 (ICMPv4) 统计数据。

span.span: Provides Internet Control Message Protocol for IPv4 (ICMPv4) statistical data for the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ICMPv4 是一组用于 Internet 协议版本4的错误和信息性消息。ICMPv4 is a set of error and informational messages for use with Internet Protocol version 4. 在 IETF RFC 792 中定义了 ICMP 版本4。ICMP version 4 is defined in IETF RFC 792. 方法使用此类 来返回 ICMPv4 流量信息。This class is used by the method to return ICMPv4 traffic information. ## Examples 下面的示例显示当前 ICMPv4 统计信息。The following example displays the current ICMPv4 statistics. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#6)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数只能由派生自的类调用 。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property AddressMaskRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long AddressMaskRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“地址掩码应答”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Address Mask Reply messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的“地址掩码应答”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Address Mask Reply messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 地址掩码请求和答复消息用于确定本地子网的子网掩码中的位数。Address Mask Request and Reply messages are used to determine the number of bits in the subnet mask for the local subnet. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#29](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#29)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#29](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#29)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#29](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#29)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取由于数据包的目标中存在无法访问的地址而接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4) 消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) messages that were received because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的“无法到达目标”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 出于以下任何原因，可以将无法访问目标的消息发送到作为数据包源的计算机：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 计算机找不到目标地址的路由。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 以管理员身份禁止与目标地址进行通信。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火墙禁止将数据包传递到目标。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 无法访问目标地址。The destination address is unreachable. - 无法访问目标端口。The destination port is unreachable. 例如，没有可用于数据包协议的侦听器。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#23)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#23)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long DestinationUnreachableMessagesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取由于数据包的目标中存在无法访问的地址而发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4) 消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) messages that were sent because of a packet having an unreachable address in its destination.

value.span: 值，指定发送的“无法到达目标”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Destination Unreachable messages sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 出于以下任何原因，可以将无法访问目标的消息发送到作为数据包源的计算机：A Destination Unreachable message can be sent to the computer that is the source of a packet for any of the following reasons: - 计算机找不到目标地址的路由。The computer cannot find a route to the destination address. - 以管理员身份禁止与目标地址进行通信。Communication with the destination address is administratively prohibited. 例如，防火墙禁止将数据包传递到目标。For example, a firewall prevents delivery of packets to the destination. - 无法访问目标地址。The destination address is unreachable. - 无法访问目标端口。The destination port is unreachable. 例如，没有可用于数据包协议的侦听器。For example, there is no listener available for the packet's protocol. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#23)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#23)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property EchoRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long EchoRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“回送应答”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Echo Reply messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的 ICMP“回送应答”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of number of ICMP Echo Reply messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回显请求和回显回复消息允许计算机从网络上的远程计算机请求 ICMP 响应。Echo Request and Echo Reply messages allow a computer to request an ICMP response from a remote computer on a network. 此功能通常用于确定远程地址的有效性。This functionality is often used to determine the validity of remote addresses. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#21)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#21)]

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的 ICMPv4 消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMPv4 messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将发送 ICMPv4 消息以传达有关使用 Internet 协议版本4（ (IPv4) 发送的数据包）的错误和信息。ICMPv4 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets that were sent using the Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4). ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#20)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#20)]

summary.span: 获取已发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4) 消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) messages that were sent.

value.span: 一个 值，指定已发送的 ICMPv4 消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMPv4 messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将发送 ICMPV4 消息来传达有关使用 Internet 协议版本4（ (IPv4) 发送的数据包）的错误和信息。ICMPV4 messages are sent to communicate errors and information about packets that were sent using Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4). ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#20)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ParameterProblemsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long ParameterProblemsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“参数问题”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Parameter Problem messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的 ICMP“参数问题”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Parameter Problem messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当主机计算机或路由器在处理数据包标头的内容时遇到问题（例如，遇到无效的 IPv4 选项或无效的下一标头类型）时，将发送参数问题消息。Parameter Problem messages are sent when a host computer or router encounters problems while processing the contents of a packet header, such as encountering an invalid IPv4 option or an invalid Next Header type. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#27](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#27)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#27)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#27)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当主机计算机或路由器在处理数据包标头的内容时遇到问题（例如，遇到无效的 IPv4 选项或无效的下一标头类型）时，将发送参数问题消息。Parameter Problem messages are sent when a host computer or router encounters problems while processing the contents of a packet header, such as encountering an invalid IPv4 option or an invalid Next Header type. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的 ICMP 重定向消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Redirect messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重定向消息由路由器发送，通知主机具有更好的目标地址路由。Redirect messages are sent by routers to inform a host computer of a better route for a destination address. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#25)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#25)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#25)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property RedirectsSent As Long
public: abstract property long RedirectsSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取已发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4) 重定向消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Redirect messages that were sent.

value.span: 一个 值，指定已发送的 ICMP 重定向消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Redirect messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重定向消息由路由器发送，通知主机具有更好的目标地址路由。Redirect messages are sent by routers to inform a host computer of a better route for a destination address. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#25)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#25)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#25)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SourceQuenchesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long SourceQuenchesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“源抑制”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Source Quench messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的“源抑制”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Source Quench messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于输出队列中没有足够的空间而丢弃数据包时，将发送源抑制消息。Source Quench messages are sent when a packet was discarded because of insufficient space in the output queue. 如果数据包到达得太快而无法处理，则目标计算机还可以发送源抑制消息。A destination computer can also send a Source Quench message if packets arrive too quickly to be processed. 源抑制消息是对主机的请求，用于将流量发送到 Internet 目标的速率缩短。The source quench message is a request to the host to cut back the rate at which it is sending traffic to the Internet destination. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#24)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#24)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SourceQuenchesSent As Long
public: abstract property long SourceQuenchesSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取已发送的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“源抑制”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Source Quench messages that were sent.

value.span: 一个 值，指定已发送的“源抑制”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Source Quench messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于输出队列中没有足够的空间而丢弃数据包时，将发送源抑制消息。Source Quench messages are sent when a packet was discarded because of insufficient space in the output queue. 如果数据包到达得太快而无法处理，则目标计算机还可以发送源抑制消息。A destination computer can also send a Source Quench message if packets arrive too quickly to be processed. 源抑制消息是对主机的请求，用于将流量发送到 Internet 目标的速率缩短。The source quench message is a request to the host to cut back the rate at which it is sending traffic to the Internet destination. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#24)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#24)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“超时”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Time Exceeded messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的 ICMP“超时”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Time Exceeded messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据包的跃点限制决定在被丢弃之前可以转发多少次。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 每次转发数据包时，它的跃点限制值将减少1。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 当跃点限制达到0时，或者当路由器接收到其跃点限制设置为零的数据包时，数据包将被丢弃，数据包的源将收到一条超时消息，指示初始跃点限制太小或数据包被路由循环。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#26)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#26)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimeExceededMessagesSent As Long
public: abstract property long TimeExceededMessagesSent { long get(); };

value.span: 一个 值，指定已发送的 ICMP“超时”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of ICMP Time Exceeded messages that were sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据包的跃点限制决定在被丢弃之前可以转发多少次。A packet's Hop Limit determines how many times it can be forwarded before it is discarded. 每次转发数据包时，它的跃点限制值将减少1。Each time a packet is forwarded, its Hop Limit value is decremented by one. 当跃点限制达到0时，或者当路由器接收到其跃点限制设置为零的数据包时，数据包将被丢弃，数据包的源将收到一条超时消息，指示初始跃点限制太小或数据包被路由循环。When the Hop Limit reaches zero or when a router receives a packet with its Hop Limit set to zero, the packet is discarded and the source of the packet receives a Time Exceeded message indicating that the initial Hop Limit was too small or that the packet was caught in a routing loop. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#26)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#26)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TimestampRepliesReceived As Long
public: abstract property long TimestampRepliesReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接收到的 Internet 控制消息协议版本 4 (ICMPv4)“时间戳应答”消息的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of Internet Control Message Protocol version 4 (ICMPv4) Timestamp Reply messages that were received.

value.span: 一个 值，指定接收到的“时间戳应答”消息的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of Timestamp Reply messages that were received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks "时间戳请求" 消息将导致接收计算机向始发计算机发送时间戳回复。A Timestamp Request message causes the receiving computer to send a timestamp reply back to the originating computer. 这些消息用于衡量网络上的传输速度。These messages are used to measure the transmission speed on a network. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#28](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#28)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#28)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#28)]
